properties.areaDesc: Newton, MS; Scott, MS; Neshoba, MS
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 11 at 9:35AM CST until January 11 at 10:15AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northern Newton County in east central Mississippi...
Northeastern Scott County in central Mississippi...
Southern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi...

* Until 1015 AM CST.

* At 935 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located near Forest, moving northeast at 60 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Conehatta around 945 AM CST.
Prospect around 950 AM CST.
Stratton and Dixon around 955 AM CST.
Neshoba and Little Rock around 1000 AM CST.
Bethsaida, House and Herbert Springs around 1005 AM CST.
Forestdale around 1015 AM CST.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include
Tucker, Lake and Sebastopol.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 10:15 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
